DialogueNode.Text: You didn't hear this from me, but apparently there's a custody battle going on between the parents. There's been multiple incidents of Sara neglecting her children.

DialogueOption.Text: Alright, Paul, thanks so much for your help.

DialogueNode.Text: Actually, she helped me organise a large book-a-thon, where kids around the neighbourhood were able to get free books.

DialogueOption.Text: Alright, Paul, thanks so much for your help.

DialogueNode.Text: Personally, I just think her hands became way too full handling Tommy and Lara. There's only so much a strong woman can handle before it becomes too much.

DialogueOption.Text: What did you mean by too much?

DialogueNode.Text: Oh, nothing really. Sara's been such a good person to me, it'd be rude of me to gossip about her.
